name: Ext_R5_PlanDefinition_go_ta_detail
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.PlanDefinition.goal.target.detail[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents PlanDefinition.goal.target.detail[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PlanDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The target value to be achieved
element.definition: The target value of the measure to be achieved to signify fulfillment of the goal, e.g. 150 pounds or 7.0%, or in the case of pharmaceutical quality - NMT 0.6%, Clear solution, etc. Either the high or low or both values of the range can be specified. When a low value is missing, it indicates that the goal is achieved at any value at or below the high value. Similarly, if the high value is missing, it indicates that the goal is achieved at any value at or above the low value.
element.comment: `PlanDefinition.goal.target.detail[x]` maps to R4B `PlanDefinition.goal.target.detail[x]`. Type `string` has no mapping Type `boolean` has no mapping Type `integer` has no mapping Type `Ratio` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
